select count(0) from t_employee AS e LEFT JOIN t_bu AS b ON e.BU_ID = b.BU_ID LEFT JOIN t_project AS p ON e.PROJECT_ID = p.PROJECT_ID
LEFT JOIN t_personal_training AS pt ON pt.EMPLOYEE_ID = e.EMPLOYEE_ID and pt.status=1
WHERE 1 = 1
AND pt.TRAINING_ID = #{trainingId}

select aaa.er_number,aaa.hr_number ,aaa.name,aaa.ename,d.name as NAME1,e.name as NAME2,aaa.course_name as NAME3 from (select c.er_number,c.hr_number,c.name,c.ename,c.bu_id,c.project_id,b.course_name,aa.training_id from (select a.TRAINING_ID,a.EMPLOYEE_ID from t_personal_training a where a.status = 1) aa left join t_training b on aa.training_id = b.training_id left join t_employee c on aa.employee_id = c.employee_id) aaa left join t_bu d on aaa.bu_id=d.bu_id left join t_project e on aaa.project_id=e.project_id where aaa.training_id = #{trainingId} LIMIT #{currentPage},10;

select aaa.er_number,aaa.hr_number ,aaa.name,aaa.ename,d.name as NAME1,e.name as NAME2,aaa.course_name as NAME3 from (select c.er_number,c.hr_number,c.name,c.ename,c.bu_id,c.project_id,b.course_name,aa.training_id from (select a.TRAINING_ID,a.EMPLOYEE_ID from t_personal_training a) aa left join t_training b on aa.training_id = b.training_id left join t_employee c on aa.employee_id = c.employee_id) aaa left join t_bu d on aaa.bu_id=d.bu_id left join t_project e on aaa.project_id=e.project_id where aaa.training_id = #{trainingId} LIMIT #{currentPage},10;
